mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT NO , TITLE , DIRECTOR , ACTOR , RELEASEDATE , RUNNINGTIME , AGE , COUNTRY , INFO , PROFILEIMG , GENRE , ENDDATE FROM MOVIE ORDER BY NO desc ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start}
SELECT NO , TITLE , DIRECTOR , ACTOR , RELEASEDATE , RUNNINGTIME , AGE , COUNTRY , INFO , PROFILEIMG , GENRE , ENDDATE FROM MOVIE WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM MOVIE
